label: Welcome to RAVAN
title: Enjoy Your Stay in Our Hotel
descriptions: Located prominently in Tangalle by the shoreline in the South of the beautiful Island, Ravan Resort is the ideal intimate retreat to experience the beautiful Sri Lankan beaches located less than 100 meters away, Embrace the quality of our exceptional 14 rooms all including A/C, cable TV, hot water, along with 4 of our 2 story cabana/chalet rooms.

All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower, while some units at the resort also have a seating area. At Ravan Resort Tangalle all rooms have bed linen and towels.
